title: gradle building 遇错
author: Crazy_sir
txt_content:
Execution failed for task ':applySourcePatches'.
> com.cloudbees.diff.PatchException: Cannot find hunk target
每次失败都会抛出同一个异常

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
你的mc和forge版本？有没有动过build.gradle和缓存文件？
大概率是联网问题。

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: xueya血牙
replies.txt_content: 是因为MD不支持AdoptOpenJDK的OpenJ9虚拟机，换个jdk就好了
